Options.Fail:
Dave, is that wallet empty? I cant believe you were gonna try to pay him to go away but what's even worse is that
you were about to try to pay him to leav with money you didn't even have. Shame on you dave, thanks to you bungling
all of your own hard work we're all going to be out of a place to live.
Options.Success:
Dave, what are you doing? We need that money for rent! Damn it dave, I cant believe you just gave away some of our
rent money. You worked so hard for that and now it's gone. Boo you dave, boo you. When you're done being ashamed of 
yourself hit any key so we can get going.

Options.Fail:
Dave what are you digging around in your pocket for, you got rid of your last candy bar a while ago. Oh no, it's to
late now, the squirrel has you at knife point, oh the humanity! Quick dave, throw a couple dollars at it! Hit any 
key when your ready to run, quick!
Options.Success:
Good thinking Dave, that squirrel I didn't realize that the squirrel was just hangry. I guess it's just like they say,
you're not you when your hungry. Now let's get goind dave before the squirrel realizes that he can still try to take 
your wallet.

Options.Fail:
Dave what are you digging around in your pocket for, you got rid of your last candy bar a while ago. Oh no, it's to
late now, the squirrel has you at knife point, oh the humanity! Quick dave, throw a couple dollars at it! Hit any 
key when your ready to run, quick!
Options.Success:
Good thinking Dave, that squirrel I didn't realize that the squirrel was just hangry. I guess it's just like they say,
you're not you when your hungry. Now let's get goind dave before the squirrel realizes that he can still try to take 
your wallet.

scenes.Text:
Oh my god Dave, it's a squrrel. Whoah, I think he wants your wallet. Be careful dave he has a knife and I think he's 
smoking! I dont even know how a squirrel can smoke dave, that cannot be healthy. What are you gonna do dave? I would 
just run but that's just me.

Options.Fail:
Oh, that's pretty nice of you Dave, I didn't expect you to be such a dog person. I honestly though you were kind
of a jerk, especially with the constantly complaining about us not paying rent. Then again I guess only a real
monster could hate dogs. Okay, let's get going before I get fleas or something. Come on, stop petting it and hit 
any button!
Options.Success:
Oh, that's pretty nice of you Dave, I didn't expect you to be such a dog person. I honestly though you were kind
of a jerk, especially with the constantly complaining about us not paying rent. Then again I guess only a real
monster could hate dogs. Okay, let's get going before I get fleas or something. Come on, stop petting it and hit 
any button!

Options.Fail:
Good thinking checking the collar Dave. I didn't peg you as the common sense type, probably because of you still having 
us as flat mates. What does it say, 'Margo'? Kind of a weird name for a dog. Oh no, it's taking off. I guess we'll never
know who it belongs to. Oh well, hit any button so we can get going.
Options.Success:
Good thinking checking the collar Dave. I didn't peg you as the common sense type, probably because of you still having 
us as flat mates. What does it say, 'Margo'? Kind of a weird name for a dog. Oh no, it's taking off. I guess we'll never
know who it belongs to. Oh well, hit any button so we can get going.

Options.Fail:
Oh no dave, you dont have anything to eat. That's too bad, you got it's hopes up to and now it's gonna be sad. You 
monster. If you're done making an innocent mutt feel bad then hit a button so we can go.
Options.Success:
Good thinking Dave, if it's a stray it probably hasn't eaten in a while. You're doing good work dave.  Maybe there's a heart
inside of that that black hole of a heart. Somewhere. Maybe not. Oh hey, it dropped dollar! We could use that. When you're
a button already so we can get goin!

scenes.Text:
Look, it's a dog! How adorable. You should take a moment to admire it dave, I think the landlord can wait. I wonder 
who's dog this is or if they have an owner at all. For all we know Dave he could be a stray. I think it might have
something in it's mouth.

Options.Fail:
Oh no dave, you got it wrong! Now you need to give him a treat. Wait, you didn't know how that works? Dave, if you
had to fill a book with everything you didnt know then you probably could fill a library. Oh and you dont have any?
I'll spot you this once, now hit a button so we can go.
Options.Success:
Oh no dave, you got it wrong!Now you need to give him a treat.Wait, you didn't know how that works? Dave, if you
had to fill a book with everything you didnt know then you probably could fill a library. Anyways, hit a button so
we can go.

Options.Fail:
Wow dave, i can't beleive you're right. Now he has to give us a dollar, as is the owl code. Now hit a button. take the dollar
and let's get going.
Options.Success:
Wow dave, i can't beleive you're right. Now he has to give us a dollar, as is the owl code. Now hit a button. take the dollar
and let's get going.

Options.Fail:
Damn, that's what I thought to! You know, because of the legs. Anyways, now you need to give him a treat. Wait, you didn't 
know how that works? Dave, if you had to fill a book with everything you didnt know then you probably could fill a library.
Anyways, hit a button so we can go.
Options.Success:
Damn, that's what I thought to! You know, because of the legs. Anyways, now you need to give him a treat. Wait, you didn't 
know how that works? Dave, if you had to fill a book with everything you didnt know then you probably could fill a library.
Anyways, hit a button so we can go.

scenes.Text:
Oh look an owl. Dave, you should see if it has a riddle.As everyone know owls love riddles.What, you didnt 
know this? Well dave it's probably not the first or the last thing that you didnt know. Now let's get over there 
so we can do some riddle solving Okay, what is a house hold item that's always on the move yet never leaves its 
spot? Wow, that's a hard one.

Options.Fail: You try to ask him about money but he says that you're too poor to understand
Options.Success: It took alot of work but you managed to learn about investment portfolios which miraculously turned into more money!

Options.Fail: Good Idea Dave, by ignoring it it cant do anything to us!
Options.Success: Good Idea Dave, by ignoring it it cant do anything to us!

Options.Fail: Wow Dave, I cant believe you got beat up by a shrew. When you're done crying press a button so we can go.
Options.Success:
Dave you monster, what are you doint to him!? Well, at least now we got some mroe money to pay rent.
Press a button so we can get going.

scenes.Text: Oh look, a shrew dave! He seems to be rather shrewd. Maybe he'll have something of use. You should do something Dave!

Options.Fail: Unfortunately, Dave, your offering wasn't enough to satisfy the bandit's appetite and he took some of your cash of Dac Monalds.
Options.Success: Well done, Dave. Your quick thinking paid off, and you've still got your supplies.

Options.Fail: Oh no, Dave, not fast enough! The raccoon bandit catches up and snatches your wallet. Bravo, what a fail!
Options.Success: You somehow manage to outrun a raccoon. Impressive, Dave! You get to keep your stuff and your energy. What a feat!

scenes.Text: Dave, oh no! It's a raccoon bandit, wearing a mask and brandishing a tiny but menacing looking twig like a weapon. He wants to rob you!

Options.Fail:
Oh dear, Dave, your poker face is no match for the seagull's cunning. He just cleaned you out and leaves you in financial ruin.
 Bravo on the gamble!
Options.Success:
Well, would you look at that! Dave, you're a card shark in disguise. You won the game, and the seagull hands over some of 
his ill-gotten gains. A true high roller, you are!

Options.Fail: Wow dave, you're really bad at negotiating. You're lucky he didnt take your kidney.
Options.Success: Remarkable, Dave! Your smooth talking convinced the seagull to lower his demands. Now he only robbed you a little bit!

scenes.Text:
Dave, brace yourself for another riveting city encounter! This time, it's a slick-looking seagull in a pinstripe suit and 
sunglasses, strutting your way. He's got a sly grin that could rival a fox.
